dotfiles
--------

# Requirements:

- fish
- rust
- zellij
- helix
- Wezterm
- brew (mac only)
- yadm
- yazi
- fzf
- zoxide
- fd
- ripgrep
- serpl
- rsync

# MacOS-related dependencies and configs

- brew

# Linux-related dependencies and configs

- ttf-firacode-nerd

# Installation

```bash
yadm clone <url-here>
yadm bootstrap
```

Bootstrap will:

- Set fish theme
- Install fisher and plugins

On macOS:

- Install everything from `.Brewfile`
